## Project Overview
- Analyze BMW worldwide sales dataset (2010â€“2024)
- Clean, preprocess, and engineer features for modeling
- Perform Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) to uncover trends
- Predict car prices using Linear Regression and Random Forest
- Assess model stability over time and feature importance

---

## Dataset & Cleaning
- Raw dataset: `bmw_worldwide_sales.csv` (+50,000 rows)
- Key cleaning steps:
  - Standardized categorical columns
  - Handled missing values and duplicates
  - Created features: Car Age, Log Price, Price per KM
  - One-hot encoded categorical variables for modeling
